author: pipermerriam
content:
Something that came up yesterday when <@543900561460822016> and I were discussing some ideas around future ideas/designs for the transaction pool... with the upcoming plans for verkle... which in-turn unlock the ability for clients to perform stateless block execution/verification... which has been touted as a way for ethereum clients to be "stateless".... which will remove client's ability to do arbitrary state access since they will no longer be a full node and will no longer have a state database... results in clients not being able to participate in transaction gossip since they will lose the ability to perform validation on the transaction pool.

Highlighting this here as I'm not sure it's been part of the discussions thus far.
